section.heading: Grandfather clause.
section.text: Individuals currently deemed eligible and receiving services under this subchapter shall not have their eligibility altered or impacted by the Developmental Disability Eligibility Reform Amendment Act of 2022 ([, passed on 2nd reading on March 1, 2022 (Enrolled version of Bill 24-268)]D.C. Law 24-1__).

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 24-117: § 4 of D.C. Law 24-117 provided that the creation of this section by § 3(c)(1) of D.C. Law 24-117 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.
